name: Acrylic Paint Set
ingredients: High-quality acrylic pigments, purified water, and a durable binder for long-lasting vibrancy and adhesion.

name: Sketchbook 100 Sheets
ingredients: Premium-quality paper designed to provide a smooth surface for all your sketches and drawings.

name: Watercolor Paint Set
ingredients: Finely ground pigments, water, and natural gum arabic for creating transparent and luminous watercolor paintings.

name: Oil Pastel Set
ingredients: Vibrant and creamy oil pastel pigments that glide smoothly on various surfaces.

name: Watercolor Brush Set
ingredients: High-quality synthetic bristles and a comfortable wooden handle for precise and controlled watercolor painting.

name: Canvas Pack (Set of 3)
ingredients: Sturdy canvas material stretched over a durable wooden frame for creating professional-quality artworks.

name: Oil Paint Kit (Beginner's Set)
ingredients: Rich oil pigments, linseed oil, and quality fillers for smooth consistency, ideal for beginners exploring oil painting.

name: Colored Pencil Set
ingredients: Richly pigmented colored pencil cores encased in high-quality wood for smooth and vibrant coloring.

name: Easel with Storage Drawer
ingredients: Elegant wooden easel with a convenient storage drawer, crafted with a blend of wood and metal for stability and durability.

name: Palette Knife Set
ingredients: High-quality stainless steel palette knives with ergonomic wooden handles for precise and versatile painting techniques.

name: Art Markers (Set of 24)
ingredients: Vibrant alcohol-based ink markers with durable plastic bodies for creating bold and expressive artworks.

name: Pottery Clay Kit
ingredients: Premium-quality clay and essential tools for pottery enthusiasts, providing a versatile medium for artistic expression.
